law.catch_line: The Board of Trustees shall reduce a member's allowance if the member:...

text.section:
The Board of Trustees shall reduce a member's allowance if the member:
received any accumulated contributions, other than additional contributions, in connection with a prior separation from employment;
is credited with prior eligibility service; and
does not repay, with interest to the date of retirement, the amount received.
A reduction under subsection (a) of this section shall equal the actuarial equivalent of the amount, including interest, that is not repaid.
